title: Start
body:
<<unhide Haia>>
Renata: Hey!
<<moveDown Haia 200 220>>
<<moveRight Mia 1 60>>
<<moveRight Renata 1 60>>
<<moveDown Haia 400 220>>
<<moveDown Mia 1 20>>
<<moveDown Renata 1 20>>
Mia: Was that Roundier Haia?
Renata: Yeah! He looked worried.
Mia: What do you think he's doing?
Renata: How about we find out? Let's go follow him!
Mia: I don't know...maybe we should leave him alone?
Renata: Maybe we can help him and he'll let us into his school?.
Mia: Uh...I guess...I have a bad feeling about this.
Renata: Let's hurry!
